body.name: Rejuvenate Click N Clean Multi-Surface Spray Mop All-In-One Kit Cleans And Revitalizes Floors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 55 mins
features: CLICK N CLEAN ALL FLOORS MOP KIT: Includes mop and three reusable microfiber pads
ALL FLOORS CLEANER: Safe for use on sealed hardwood, tile, laminate & vinyl to eliminate dirt & grime
MACHINE-WASHABLE MICROFIBER PADS: Reusable microfiber cleaning pads are washable up to 100X, giving you an economical way to keep your floors looking great
ALL-IN-ONE KIT: Makes floors look new again
SAFE FOR USE AROUND KIDS AND PETS: When used per directions on product label. For additional details, visit rejuvenateproducts.com/safe
body.description: Rejuvenate Click n Clean Multi-Surface Spray Mop System has everything you need to eliminate dirt and grime and give your floors a brilliant clean. This all-in-one kit includes a durable mop with an extra-large pivoting head and three reusable microfiber pads. With refillable cleaning solutions that easily click into place, this versatile mop system can be used with any 32 oz or 40 oz Rejuvenate cleaner, including All Floors Cleaner, Luxury Vinyl Floor Cleaner, Wood Floor Cleaner, Stone, Tile & Laminate Cleaner and Tile & Grout Floor Cleaner. The extra-wide mop head swivels to clean hard-to-reach places and the heavy-duty scrub pad tackles stuck-on messes. Plus, the reusable microfiber cleaning pads are washable up to 100X, giving you an economical way to keep your floors looking great. Always test on an inconspicuous area before using. Spray Rejuvenate All Floors Cleaner on the floor and mop with the grain. Allow the floor to dry completely before walking. NOTE: Only use when temperatures are above 50 degrees Fahrenheit. Do not oversaturate.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-Surface Spray Mop The Rejuvenate Click n Clean system is designed for use in rooms throughout your home! Durable & Light Weight This extremely durable, quick and lightweight spray mop has two connection points with reinforced plastic covers and an easy pull trigger for even dispersion, making cleaning easy. All Floors Cleaner The Rejuvenate All Floors cleaner cleans & protects hardwood, tile, vinyl, laminate, and more! Scrubbing Pad For Stubborn Stains The convenient super scrub pad removes the sticky stuck-on messes easily without scratching your floors.

Microfiber Deep Cleaning Pad Machine Washable, deep cleaning microfiber pad designed to trap dirt and grime. Microfiber Dusting Pad Super plush, statically charged, machine washable microfiber dust pad to pick up pet hair and dust like a magnet. Click-on Grout Brush Cleans Grout Instantly Just click-on the included grout brush and click-in Rejuvenate's Grout Deep Cleaner to get your grout looking like new in minutes without ever getting on your hands and knees. Click n Clean Spray Mop Storage Caddy Organizer The sturdy Click n Clean Mop Caddy assembles in seconds. It's ideal for pantries or small broom closets. The Rejuvenate Click n Clean Caddy is an organizational dream providing dedicated storage space for all Click n Clean accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a little wobbly but works really well on my new vinyl floors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GLAD I TOOK A RISK ON THIS!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am just finishing a condo reno and my contractor recommended LVP. I tried multiple cleaning products with a regular wet mop and everything left streaks. I stumbled across this unit and read ALL of the positive and negative reviews. I finally took the risk and am so glad I did! I've been using it for a week now and can say it does not leave a sticky residue, the spray nosel does not get clogged UF rinsed with warm water after each use, it does not break easily and it is not heavy compared to a bucket of water!A few tips...1) Do not force the handle parts together. If the pieces don't easily snap together, turn the around. I had the backwards at first and couldn't get them to snap together but as soon as I turned them around, easy peasy!2) Rinse that nosel after each use. Just hold the mop end over the.sink and give it a light rinse.3) Make sure the bottle of liquid cleaner is completely locked in or it will leak. I tested over the sink by giving the bottle a light squeeze. If liquid leaked out, I adjusted the bottle tighter until no liquid came out4) Be sure to adjust the spray nosel so it sprays in the right direction. After a week of mopping every day (I have pets), I have not had to re-adjust. Do tip the handle back if you want it to spray further forward. Other than that, you don't have to do much to get the spray where you want it to go.Lastly, the light sheen this product gives is exactly what I was hoping for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It had no instructions on assembly. It wouldn't spray the cleaning solution so I thought I assembled it incorrectly.It sat for a month till I asked my son too fix it. He pushed the the cleaner bottle in a little more and the trigger finally worked and the mop head sprayed. But it leaked out in my trunk . What little was left I itself for one mopping.I did not see any remarkable change in the hardwood floor after applying the rejuv. Cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had some shallow scratches from furniture being dragged on my hardwood floor. After being quoted anywhere from $1000 to $2100 to have the floor refinished (apparently it was the only way to remove the scratches) I stumbled across this product. After reading the reviews I decided to give it a try and boy am I glad I did! It not only removed the scratches but gave the whole floor a gorgeous luster. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality Applicator
reviews.reviewText: First, the Rejuvenate product floor cleaner itself is excellent. Not so much on the applicator. It is not very structurally stable. Flexes a lot even when just pushing on the floor with no attempt to apply force to clean. Also, unless you have pretty grip strength this will be difficult to use, especially when trying to do even a modest floor size. The resistance on the trigger is a little excessive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use and does an excellent job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Deleted my Review. Reposting Because this Mop Sucks.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the mop bundle because it was cheaper than ordering the individual replacement pieces of pad, adapters etc. The mop broke the first time I used it. The adapter came off the bottle and is stuck in the mop. My original post had photos btw. The mop is unusable. I called Rejuvenate customer service and was told they'd refund me in 4 to 6 weeks(!) once I'd submitted my proof of purchace/receipt and UPC via email. The automated message also states that I'll have to send the items back but doesn't say that they will provide packaging or pay for postage.The best part is: the only reason I ordered this mop bundle is because the previous owner of our new house left her mop behind and I used it and the little bit of cleaner left to clean the wood floor in my bedroom. After my new one broke I figured I'd just use the old one here so the big refill cleaner O also bought wouldn't go to waste. But alas, that one broke as well. The spray nozzle stopped working. I flushed and soaked the mop with warm water as per the instructions but it still doesn't work.In conclusion: 2 mops broken. Don't buy this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Ease of use and light weight make this product great for people like us with mobility issues.
reviews.reviewText: Loved this product. The dust cloth is amazing!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Por fin pude ver nuestra duela limpia y brillante.
reviews.reviewText: Dejó la duela limpia y brillante.

reviews.reviewTitle: Found the mop a bit weak as I use pressure.
reviews.reviewText: Like the cloths and the grout scrubber that accompany the mop. As long as the cleaner is good. The spray nozzle shoots to the wall so u have to constantly monitor the position of the mop handle

reviews.reviewTitle: Rejuvenate solution constantly clogs the sprayer.
reviews.reviewText: The mop/sweeper itself is very lightweight and easy to operate however, the rejuvenate solution keeps solidifying and clogging the sprayer which then requires it to be removed and cleaned/washed out before it will work again(annoying when having a large area to be washed). The solution does do a wonderful job cleaning and shining my laminate flooring, I just wish it did not clog up the spray apparatus all the time.
the handle would not stay onthe bottle kept falling outand the mop would not glide easy it would keep turning upside downi returned it
